title: Clear noon, moderate-speed city driving with 7 braking events.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a city street with 7 braking events.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 2 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (glareDay). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 4.8 m/s). There are 7 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.

reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly because it is approaching an intersection. There are several other cars on the road, some of them are parked on the side of the road.
